summary: This module implements a Faster R-CNN detector built on MXNet/GluonCV, combining a region proposal network, feature pyramid expansion, and ROI classification/regression heads. It defines the core model class and provides factory helpers for creating pretrained variants with different ResNet backbones.
business_intent: Offer a plug‑and‑play object detection solution that can be integrated into larger vision pipelines, such as scene‑graph generation, by supplying a configurable Faster R-CNN architecture with ready‑made pretrained weights.
